website_summaries.verdict: This mix-in product can convert existing latex or acrylic paint into a trendy chalk-style paint in just minutes.
pros: Mixes well with any standard latex or acrylic paint
Can be portion-controlled for larger or smaller projects
Will not harden between uses like plaster or grout
cons: Chalk paint effect described as minimal
More expensive than plaster of paris for the same results

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so easy to use (2T mixed with 1T water and a cup of paint) and meets all of my expectations. I mixed it with Benjamin Moore flat paint to complete the project in the picture. I had lots of paint left over from my 1 cup after completing this small cabinet. Excellent coverage in one coat and the finish is hard. I also applied Dover's clear wax as a finish. It's wonderful to have an alternative like Dover's - I love being able to pick out any color. Both products have clear instructions right on the container.
customer_reviews.author: Debby R

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: If there was another star, I would gladly give it to Dover. This product is amazing. it is easy to use. it is inexpensive. It does EVERYTHING they say it will do. it is durable, covers beautifully and opens up an affordable way to redecorate. just wash your pieces with a 50/50 solution of white vinegar and water and off you go. I have used satin paint with it as I have many samples from Sherwin Williams and have had no problems with it. The coverage is much better than the expensive brands and I find it easier to use. it does take a bit longer to dry, but it is worth the wait. Try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: bartlett

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. Works great
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Works great. Used a little less than what the instructions said. I added to a quart of Sherwin Williams satin paint. A quart was all that was needed to paint my kitchen cabinets!!! It's held up great so far. Before and after pics attached.
customer_reviews.author: Misc

customer_reviews.title: The mixing was easy and I love having the option to make multiple ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to update 2 dressers I had recently purchased. The mixing was easy and I love having the option to make multiple different colors without having to purchase the very expensive pre-mixed chalk paint. In total my project only took a few hours and the paint dried very fast. I was able to cover small blemishes on the furniture with ease and only a few coats of paint. Will be purchasing again once I run out (which will be a while as this mix goes a long way)! 100% would recommend. I do not have a before photo but it turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: LilzTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend using this to make your own chalk paint! Much less expensive than those 'name' brands and you can customize your own colors. Their website provides a number of compatible, name brand paints from a variety of stores (Walmart, Lowe's, Home Depot, etc) with a detailed listing of which ones they feel worked best for mixing up chalk paint. A definite money saver!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Worked just like Annie Sloans
customer_reviews.text: I was a devoted ASCP user but it was seriously hurting my bank account. I tried this on a whim and now I'm a convert. I used a $3 paint sample from Lowes and 2 teaspoons of this mix and painted my bathroom vanity and mirror in one afternoon with perfect results. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Very cool technology and option for chalk paint
customer_reviews.text: Very cool technology and option for chalk paint. My first time using chalk paint. I used it to paint a kitchen table and chairs that get a lot of rough wear. It is chipping in tiny places here and there, but we use the s*** out of them. I think it is a high quality mix and solution to expensive chalk paints.

customer_reviews.title: Silky, not chalky
customer_reviews.text: It was far thinner than any home made or ready made product I have tried. Coverage was the best, went on silky rather than globbed and drug looking which means have to spray and rework it. The chalky powder feel was not there when dried, first or second coat which means less buffing with the wax. Less labor...
customer_reviews.author: PRINCESS JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Great STUFF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Dover et'al I am in love with this stuff!!!!!! I first started using it this week on a piece I've had for about ten years, inexpensive and REALLY in need of a face lift. I've done the calcium carbonate stuff and it requires sanding after each coat, NOT Dover's. Went on smooth as silk, no sanding required, looks great, and I'm a happy DIYer. Thanks for this wonderful product! Sincerely, Suze Hoffman
customer_reviews.author: Suze Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best chalk paint mix I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different chalk paint including Annie Sloan, Amy Howard and others. This by far is the best chalk paint mix. It is completely grit free and so smooth. I paint a lot of furniture and it is consistent every time. I would recommend this chalk paint mix 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Works really well...easy to mix and will undoubtedly save me money. Yes...I have a recipe for mixing Chalk Board Paint....but Dover's recipe is better. Knowing the price of buying ready mixed chalk paint...this beats their products in price and is comparable to their results. The mixing is nothing and what you save with this little bit of effort is fantastic. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Abu-mlhem

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use with nice end results
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make chalk paint out of samples I had to paint furniture. The results were nice and I found it to have less brush strokes than a lot of the chalk finish paints I have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works as stated
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works as stated. The only concern is that no where on the product do they tell you what the ingredients are. I feel it should be disclosed especially since you could put it on dining tables, cribs repainted and etc.
customer_reviews.author: fish to relax

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This works for making chalk paint, but there are much cheaper alternatives on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Quirkyvirgo

customer_reviews.title: i highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first attempt at chalk paint. This product was easy to mix, easy to use and looks great. I liked being able to mix my own color using the paint I had because it matched perfectly. I like the look, I'm looking for more things to paint! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: Great results using this product. Easy to use and the results were great. I love having unlimited color options by using this product. We also got the clear wax and wax brush. Our first project of turning a couple of dark, formal northeast wall units into fun Florida turquoise with coastal knobs was very encouraging. I can't wait to take on our next project. Plus we got to avoid the pretentious sounding 'stockist' of the name brand product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. It's made redoing furniture much more cost effective! I love that I can choose how much paint I'll need for a project and can make the chalk paint. I needed 3 coats of paint for my particular items so I still feel like primer is needed but overall it's a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend A +++
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this we can add to any paint and it becomes chalk paint!! Best buy I have done in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Warran

customer_reviews.title: Smooth....like butter!
customer_reviews.text: Turns latex paint into chalk paint. It is really smoother than making it with POP or Calcium Carbonate. A little goes a long way, saving you money. There really is no reason at all to buy the expensive pre-made chalk paints when you have Dover's.
customer_reviews.author: CBsopp

customer_reviews.title: Good but can make my own for much less.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but I’ve learned I don’t have spend as much money on making my own. Tks to Pinterest.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy chalk paint mix
customer_reviews.text: With this product, I can purchase a sample 8oz can of paint from my local hardware store and create any color of chalk paint I desire. It looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: purplenancy

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Much more affordable way to chalk paint a large piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it...works better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully. I got to pick my paint color at the hardware store. Just stirred a small amount in and it worked out great! I did a teal color underneath the gray, so that a little blue showed through when I sanded it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good results, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my ugly kitchen cabinets but am giving it a test run on an old cedar chest (also ugly) next week. A friend of mine recommended Dover and had really great results. Giving it 5 stars based on her experience and her great looking furniture; and on the speedy delivery and nice follow-up emails!
customer_reviews.author: mortydog

customer_reviews.title: The chalk paint was easy to use and the coverage was good
customer_reviews.text: The chalk paint was easy to use and the coverage was good. The directions were clear. I made a little error on the wax because I did not wipe off but when I realized what I had done a day later I completed that step and it all worked and dryed out fine.
customer_reviews.author: N Miller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not really get chalk effect... Going into the trash bin unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Has a really nice finish, easy to distress
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to make my own custom chalk paint. Has a really nice finish, easy to distress. Highly recommend this product over buying expensive chalk paint.
customer_reviews.author: Tschwend

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect if you follow the directions
customer_reviews.text: I was painting glass jars for a baby shower. This product worked perfect just add it to your paint you have the perfect mix if you follow the directions. It works wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Char E

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this very much! Easy to use, great paint consistency after mixing. I liked this as much as Annie Sloan Chalk paint, and you can use any color of paint you choose. I used a high quality paint.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Chalk paint mix
customer_reviews.text: Great product good price makes it easier to make lots of different colors applies great recommend purchasing

customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Only thing I would look would be if the directions were on the jar instead of on a card inside the jar. I keep misplacing that.

customer_reviews.title: This product works well. For small projects I buy ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. For small projects I buy 8 oz. sample jars with unlimited color choices. It appears this jar of Dover mix will last a long time. Will definitely buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper than chaulk paint.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions. Painted older oak kitchen cabinets with white latex paint. BEAUTIFUL 💖

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend

customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My kitchen cabinets came out beautifully! Fast shipping. Thank you so much!

customer_reviews.title: goes a long way....
customer_reviews.text: never used chalk paint before, added about 2 tbls to a quart of flat black and painted my media cabinet, two coats, looks beautiful

customer_reviews.text: This is best product , just follow their instruction to mix with paint. Easy to use on cabinet or furniture .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have done used chalk paint from Joanns before, and this mix with a cheap paint from Walmart worked better

customer_reviews.title: Smart and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have been used Annie Sloan. This is great and a lot cheaper. It can mix with anything.will continue to buy this product.😉

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay tonnes for pricey alternative chalk paints....this was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Easy - fast and really satisfactory paint finish. Thanks to all for the positive reviews and definitely a great/cheap alterative to more expensive ready-mix versions of Chalk Paint. Note - an old yoghurt tub made a good mixing container...super easy and cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: RS_road

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, used for three different pieces for furniture
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, used for three different pieces for furniture, all three pieces look awesome!! The directions are clear and easy to follow. Great price, and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Fay

customer_reviews.title: Best Chalk Paint Mix on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has heard of Annie Sloan chalk paints and how very expensive they are. I did tons of research prior to making my purchase of Dover's and am extremely satisfied so far! I used it with Lowe's Valspar Flat Interior Paint and it worked beautifully to pain old oak pieces. I am super glad I didn't expend the money on Annie Sloan's paints for my entire project and went with Dover's for a fraction of the cost. It works just as well and you have the ability to customize your colors. I highly recommend giving this a try and I promise you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! Much cheaper than buying the chalk pain
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Much cheaper than buying the chalk pain!! Highly recommend it!! Still haven't used it up and have had for probably 6 months!

customer_reviews.title: ... only chalk paint mix I have tried but I liked it enough to order more
customer_reviews.text: This is the only chalk paint mix I have tried but I liked it enough to order more.

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that I received a follow up email with helpful information to guide me through my project. I have used the paint on my first job, a huge dresser. I used Johnson Paste Wax to finish which left a very light sheen. Looking forward to the next project as I have plenty of mix.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck! no need to buy chalk paint for $39.99 when you can make your own.

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and works just like I wanted. So very easy to make ugly furniture into nice furniture.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Would highly recommend it! Used it on Mason Jars after mixing with color paint. They turned out amazing.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE Dover's Chalk Paint Powder Mix...it is very cost effective and worked perfectly! Even convinced my hubby and he is wanting to do more projects!!! Thank you for a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Dover's Chalk Paint Mix is economical and it works well when mixed with flat latex paint. Following the e-mailed instructions was helpful and my project turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic results
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I painted some oak cabinets, it was easy to use and easy to apply. The results are exactly what I wanted! It's so a lot less expensive than Anni Sloan and easier to store, the paint colors are unlimited since the paint is whatever you chose or mix. Thank you for this wonderful product I will be buying this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky T

customer_reviews.title: Great mix! Saves so much money and I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mix! Saves so much money and I get all the colors I want!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was really easy to use. The furniture that we painted turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many reasons why you need this...
customer_reviews.text: This is the ticket!! You won't regret saving money, ease of use, ease of flow, and the look you get from this stuff. Goes on like a dream with great coverage, and makes your paint more economical. The look is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: T Penn

customer_reviews.title: It works however you have to use three times the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works however you have to use three times the amount it says to make the paint otherwise its still very runny. I used it as it directed and the paint was no where near as thick at real chalk paint . I would suggest at leat using twice of what the directions say to use
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as Annie Sloan...and a lot less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Else Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for weather to cool down as I will be painting large pieces of ...
customer_reviews.text: Will update my review when I try it. Waiting for weather to cool down as I will be painting large pieces of furniture outside.
customer_reviews.author: thryallis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must
customer_reviews.text: I have done 3 full jobs with Dover Chalk Paint Mix and a Dead Flat latex paint. I could not be happier with the results so far! I have probably 3/4 left of the large container and that should be enough to finish another couple of tables. I highly recommend using this, not to mention it's environmentally friendly and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Eliran Ifrach

customer_reviews.title: Soo good!! I was a faithful Annie Sloan chalk ...
customer_reviews.text: Soo good!! I was a faithful Annie Sloan chalk paint user and I tried this to get a cheaper way with more color selection.. Cannot even believe how easy this was!!! LOVE!! Need to order more asap!! Hey dovers, what do u have comparable to Annie's wax finish?
customer_reviews.author: Brooke N Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: very good product. Mixed well and did its job. Would purchase again. Appreciate the follow ups from 5he company.
customer_reviews.author: gary mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not the best solution
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much just Plaster of Paris only more expensive! I recommend buying calcium carbonate and plaster of Paris and mixing it with paint. Better results than this.
customer_reviews.author: JJob4169

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print
customer_reviews.text: Guess I didn't read the fine print. Didn't realize until we had used the product that you are required to mix Dover's with FLAT PAINT ONLY for the product to perform well.
customer_reviews.author: Laidback

customer_reviews.title: I liked the result and would use and or order again
customer_reviews.text: Used a small amount, as directed, to mix into paint for a "Chalk Paint" project. It was very smooth and creamy. I liked the result and would use and or order again. I have my own recipe that has worked for me for the past two years on my chalk painted furniture projects, but this product has proven to be easy to use with nice results. If you are new to chalk painting this would be a great way to start! Foolproof, without having to figure out proportions that will work for you. Happy Painting!
customer_reviews.author: Avis N

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just used this to paint a Bombay chest.......... came out perfect, actually even better looking finish that "real" chalk paint!. Tip, mix the Dover mix and water until very smooth, then add to the paint and stir..........very easy and mixes great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole T. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic. I am new to the Chalk Painting and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I am new to the Chalk Painting and thought I would give this product a try. I followed the directions on the container and mixed it with the paint. The paint went on so smooth no lumps or bumps. I used what I needed of the paint and stored the rest in a mason jar until a few days later. Gave the jar a good shake and the paint was just like the first time I mixed. I liked the product so much I ordered their wax too. I will be trying it out in the next couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Smerls

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was under the impression that if I used this product and added a quart of another paint i would get a gallon. It must have just been me reading it wrong. The container it comes in is very small. When you use a quart of another paint, a little bit of water and this product it makes just over a quart. It makes the paint go on much smoother and with a good finish. It covers in one coat after this is added. I liked the product. Not sure if Ill do it again though. I might as well just buy chalk paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I did not have the results I was anticipating with the Chalk Paint Mix by Dover's. I still do not have this product application at the level I desire to achieve but what is really promising is the fact that the customer service at Dover's has gone above and beyond my expectations. I know given more time to experiment with this product and the support from Dover's customer service, I will achieve my desired results.
customer_reviews.author: LoneStarPrepper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Followed the simple directions using Behr interior paint, used two thin coats with foam roller as this is a very old piece, and probably home made. Went on easily and covered excellently, would certainly recommend the product and have more than enough for future projects as I used it in a quart of paint. I could not be more pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: l

customer_reviews.title: Great chalk additive
customer_reviews.text: I have chalk painted all of my kitchen cabinets. Originally, I had bought a different brand of chalk additive. I believe the instructions on this particular brand were much more accurate than the first one I used. This additive is very, very fine in texture. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: jlc-florida

customer_reviews.title: It came out beautifully. Now my daughter wants to borrow what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Painted all of my bedroom furniture in my daughters house. It came out beautifully. Now my daughter wants to borrow what I have left.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Kuchenbuch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...great value
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using chalk paint for a project. Pre-mixed chalk paint is ridiculously expensive so I thought I'd give this a try. It worked perfectly. My project (furniture) turned out beautifully, the quality of the paint I made using Dover's was as good as other products costing 3-4x more, and I have plenty left to mix up for my next project. I highly recommend this product and will use it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: ajotter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and much more inexpensive than the chalk paint in the shops locally. I used it to repaint a painted brick fireplace. It think I also need to wax it so it's easier to dust. But this product was really easy to use and to mix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great price, messy packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the outcome of my paint job, great alternative to buying a can of the expensive chalk paint. The only downside was that the mixing instructions were buried inside the chalk mix, and I was expecting to find the mix in a bag when i opened the jar. So open it outside! Overall would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay
customer_reviews.text: I did use this to make chalky paint and it seemed to work okay.

customer_reviews.title: I love mixing it with any left over latex paint that ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Chalk Paint Mix by Dover's because it was so much cheaper than the (very expensive) chalk paint. I love mixing it with any left over latex paint that I have in my cupboards, and it's perfect to use with the paint samples that can be purchased very cheaply online from The Home Depot. If you want to do chalk painting on a budget, this is the way to go! Would definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using chalk paint. We just bought another house and I have a ton of paint left. So this was a perfect option for me. I used it tonight for the first time. I didn't measure anything out since I didn't want to ruin my teaspoons with paint. So I just kinda eyeballed it. Super fun. There is pretty much no way you can mess up. I really love the look.

product_meta.title: Chalk Finish Paint Mix by Dover's - Add to Any Color of Flat Latex or Acrylic Paint to Make up to 1 Gallon of Inexpensive Chalk Furniture Paint - All Natural and Non-Toxic
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Pound Jar Makes 4 Quarts (1 Gallon)

 OVERCOME THE LIMITATIONS OF READY-MADE CHALK STYLE PAINTS! 
Chalk paints are wonderful but they come in Limited Colors, are sometimes Hard to Find and they are all Expensive. 

 NOW, with Dover's Chalk Finish Paint Mix and any flat latex or acrylic paint, you can make your own and 
achieve that same sought after look, in any color, for about 1/4 the cost. 


Using Dover's is Really Simple:

Find the amount of paint you want to mix in the chart on the label. 
Put the required amount of Dover's Mix in a suitable container. 
Add the water and blend. 
Add your paint, stir, and you're ready to go! 

ADD TO CART and give it a try. You will be glad you did.
feature_bullets: MAKE YOUR OWN ECONOMICAL CHALK FINISH PAINT IN ANY COLOR. COMPARABLE TO THE BEST OF THE POPULAR BRANDS. Mix with any flat latex or acrylic paint in your favorite colors. Now you don't have to choose from the limited number of colors available from the ready made brands.

FUN AND EASY TO MIX AND USE. JUST FOLLOW THE SIMPLE DIRECTIONS. Little or no sanding or priming is required before painting. Paint mixed with Dover's will stick to just about any clean surface. Even glass. Our original ultra-fine powder gives an exceptionally smooth finished surface. No sanding is needed between coats and no final sanding is required unless desired for distressing.

MIX ONLY WHAT YOU NEED. Make a cup or a gallon. It works great with paint samples or that leftover paint in the garage. Extra paint will store indefintely in a sealed container and it won't clump or harden like the DIY chalk paints made with plaster or grout.
ORDER ANY COMBINATION OF 3 OR MORE PRODUCTS FROM DOVER'S and automatically SAVE 15% ON YOUR ENTIRE ORDER. Split an order with friends or family.
ADD TO CART NOW. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE if not satisfied.
